_header: In age as he groweth sua crescat gracia fructu
Title(s): ‘fful litel he knowith quanto dolet Anglia luctu’
_description: ‘fful litel he knowith quanto dolet Anglia luctu’ — one long macaronic couple, usually appended to 4853.

BLHar218.Transcription:
In age as he growith sua crescat gracia fructufful litel he knowith
                    quanto dolet anglia luctu
